short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The compact tool for task tracking, time management, and performance insights using the Pomodoro technique.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our 20Q Pomodoro provides users with a full-featured Pomodoro timer, task tracking, and reporting capabilities. The aim is to increase productivity and focus by enabling users to structure their work into timed intervals (Pomodoros) and track their tasks. Users can review their productivity through generated reports, encouraging continual improvement. This extension fills a need for a compact, easy-to-use tool for time management and productivity enhancement.
